body: After you move the python code to `torch.sparse`, expose this function in THPModule as `_sparse_init` and add `assert torch._C._sparse_init()` at the end of `torch/sparse/__init__.py`. (See my autograd PR for how I did this there).
body_html: After you move the python code to torch.sparse, expose this function in THPModule as _sparse_init and add assert torch._C._sparse_init() at the end of torch/sparse/__init__.py. (See my autograd PR for how I did this there).
body_text: After you move the python code to torch.sparse, expose this function in THPModule as _sparse_init and add assert torch._C._sparse_init() at the end of torch/sparse/__init__.py. (See my autograd PR for how I did this there).
